# Submissão

Become an exorcist graffiti student trapped in a college from another dimension as you investigate your advisor's whereabouts and try to stay safe from a strange shadow.

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Try%20it%20now!-red?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/EltonCN/JogosTeP/releases/tag/0.1.1)

![](Media/image_Shadow_Loop2_a_2022-12-16_003_0000.png)

3D Suspense game prototype made by undergraduate and graduate students for the discipline "Jogos Digitais - Teoria e Prática" (FEEC-IA/Unicamp, 2s2022, Prof. Alfredo Suppia and Prof. José Mario De Martino). 

## Team

- [Elton Cardoso do Nascimento](https://github.com/EltonCN) (IC/Unicamp): Programming, 3D Artist (Technical, VFX, Lighting), Animation, UI, 2D Artist
- [Gilberto de Ataide Batista Faria](https://github.com/Tensaip) (IA/Unicamp): Script, 3D Artist (Materials, Lighting), Mocap, UI
- [Lucas Hideki Ueda](https://github.com/lucashueda) (FEEC/Unicamp): Mocap, 3D Artist (Modeling), Character Rigging
- [Pedro Henrique Suguino](https://github.com/Pedro-Suguino) (IC-FEEC/Unicamp): Programming, 3D Artist (Modeling)
- Ricardo Alves Moreira Mazzeo (IFCH/Unicamp): Art and story references, 3D Artist (Materials)
- [Sam Gomes](https://github.com/samrgomes): Programming
- [Vinicius Yglesias Pereira](https://github.com/Vinicius-Yglesias) (IA/Unicamp): Music and SFX, Programming

## Folder structure
- Shadow: Unity project
- Dev: sigil detection synthetic data generation and model training
- Media: images
